titleStmt.title: An aditionall ordinance of the Lords & Commons assembled in Parliament, for the better taking and expediting the accompts of the whole kingdome. Ordered by the Commons assembled in Parliament that this ordinance be forthwith printed and published. Hen. Elsynge. Cler. Parl. Dom. Com.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T.W. for Ed. Husband, printer for the Honourable House of Commons,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
